content.title: Coasters Ordered! Surveys 100% Complete
content.creator:
Jeremy Cook
March 12, 2025
content.content:
Hello,
Today I ordered all the coasters needed to fulfill the initial rewards from this Kickstarter, plus quite a few that will become stock for future listing on my Tindie Store. Thanks so much for helping to make this product a reality!
In related news, I'm extremely impressed that 100% of backers here filled out their surveys. Hopefully I can get these orders back and mail out rewards within a few weeks!
All the best - Jeremy

comments.text: I'm looking forward to recieving mine, I retire as an electrical cost engineer this summer and they will make some nice parting gifts for a few of my favorite coworkers!

content.title: Campaign Over, Thanks so much for your support!
content.creator:
Jeremy Cook
March 7, 2025
content.content:
Hello,
Thanks so much for your support of the Transistor Coaster PCB campaign, which attained a 426% funding level! I will start getting materials in for fulfilment, and please fill out your surveys when they arrive so that I can send everything out.
Again, thank you, and I'm looking forward to delivering something that you love and use daily.
-Jeremy

content.title: Transistor Coaster PCB Fully Funded!
content.creator:
Jeremy Cook
February 10, 2025
content.content:
Hello,
As of today, February 10th, this Kickstarter campaign is well over 200% funded (and was actually full funded on the first day, Feb 2nd)! Thank you all so much for your support, and I look forward to starting to fulfill these pledges as soon as the campaign is over in approximately 23 days!
Also, if you know of anyone else that might be interested in this sort of coaster, it would be awesome if you spread the word about it!
Thanks!
-Jeremy
